relevant_findings.description: Firm red plaque on the right cheek measuring 4.6 × 3.5 cm
Red, smooth plaque measuring 0.8 cm in diameter below the larger nodule
Firm plaque measuring 1.8 × 2.0 cm on the right mandible
Slightly raised, red plaque palpable behind the right ear
Fullness in the right axillary region

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: The patient exhibited acceleration in growth of the cheek lesion over the past 6 months prior to presentation, and after 6 cycles of CHOP therapy, all nodules had resolved with only faint erythema remaining.
